element-type.name: ajaxListener
element-type.description:
This works the same as ActionListener or ValueChangeListener, but for an AJAX container. Add the specified class
as a listener for AjaxEvent (sent in case of an AJAX request
for this container).

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: Fully qualified Java class name of an AjaxListener to be created and registered.

element-type.name: keepAlive
element-type.description:
This tag get bean by EL expression '#{'+name+'}' and store bean instance in component tree. After restoring view state, bean is putted to request-scope attributes with name.
Since, every view will be use own instance of bean for expressions '#{name....}'

attribute-type.name: beanName
attribute-type.description: name of bean for EL-expressions.

attribute-type.name: ajaxOnly
attribute-type.description: if true, bean value restored in ajax requests only.

element-type.name: actionparam
element-type.description: A combination of the functionality of two JSF tags, <f:actionListener>; and <f:param>. At the render phase, it's decoded by parent component (<h:commandLink>; or like) as usual. <br /> At the process request phase, if the parent component performs an action event, update the value specified in the "assignTo" attribute as its value. <br /> If a converter attribute is specified, use it to encode and decode the value to a string stored in the html parameter. <br />

attribute-type.name: assignTo
attribute-type.description: EL expression for updatable bean property. This property will be updated if the parent command component performs an actionEvent.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: converter
attribute-type.description: ID of a converter to be used or a reference to a converter.

attribute-type.name: name
attribute-type.description: A name of this parameter

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: An initial value or a value binding

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: noEscape
attribute-type.description: If set to true, the value will not enclosed within single quotes and there will be no escaping of characters. This allows the use of the value as JavaScript code for calculating value on the client-side. This doesn't work with non-AJAX components.

element-type.name: commandButton
element-type.description: Renders an HTML "input" element. <br /> During Decoding: Obtains the Map from the "requestParameterMap" property of the ExternalContext. If the value in the Map for the value of the "clientId" property of the component is not null, create a javax.faces.event.ActionEvent around the component, and pass it to the queueEvent() method of the component. If the request is Ajax-performed, add its target IDs of the reRender property to the rendered areas list of the nesting AjaxContainer. <br /> During Encoding: Builds an AJAX.Submit JavaScript call for the "onclick" event. Renders the clientId of the component as the value of the "name" attribute. Renders the current value of the component as the value of the "value" attribute. If the "styleClass" attribute is specified, render its value as the value of the "class" attribute. Renders child components inside the HTML "input" element.

attribute-type.name: actionListener
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at method accepting an ActionEvent with return type void

attribute-type.name: reRender
attribute-type.description: Id['s] (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

attribute-type.name: ajaxSingle
attribute-type.description: if true , submits ONLY one field/link, instead of all form controls.

attribute-type.name: data
attribute-type.description: Serialized (on default with JSON) data passed on the client by a developer on AJAX request. It's accessible via "data.foo" syntax

attribute-type.name: eventsQueue
attribute-type.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.).

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: submit|reset|image|button This attribute specifies a type of control to create. The default value for this attribute is "submit"

attribute-type.name: lang
attribute-type.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

attribute-type.name: accesskey
attribute-type.description: This attribute assigns an access key to an element. An access key is a single character from the document character set. Note: Authors should consider the input method of the expected reader when specifying an accesskey

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: title
attribute-type.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component

attribute-type.name: style
attribute-type.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

attribute-type.name: dir
attribute-type.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component

attribute-type.name: alt
attribute-type.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component.

attribute-type.name: onblur
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; the element lost the focus

attribute-type.name: onmouseup
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is released

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: The current value for this component

attribute-type.name: action
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at the application action to be invoked, if this UIComponent is activated by the user, during the Apply Request Values or Invoke Application phase of the request processing lifecycle, depending on the value of the immediate property

attribute-type.name: focus
attribute-type.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: requestDelay
attribute-type.description: Delay (in ms.) for send ajax request on JavaScript event. In conjunction with events queue can reduce number of requests on keyboard or mouse move events.

attribute-type.name: onmousemove
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved within

attribute-type.name: ignoreDupResponses
attribute-type.description: If true, unfinished request will be aborted on new event.

attribute-type.name: ondblclick
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is double-clicked

attribute-type.name: status
attribute-type.description: ID (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of Request status component.

attribute-type.name: onmouseout
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved away

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

attribute-type.name: oncomplete
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: bypassUpdates
attribute-type.description: If true, after process validations phase it skips updates of model beans on a force render response. It can be used for validating components input

attribute-type.name: tabindex
attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767. User agents should ignore leading zeros

attribute-type.name: image
attribute-type.description: Absolute or relative URL of the image to be displayed for this button. If specified, this "input" element will be of type "image". Otherwise, it will be of the type specified by the "type" property with a label specified by the "value" property.

attribute-type.name: onkeyup
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is released

attribute-type.name: onfocus
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; the element got the focus

attribute-type.name: onkeydown
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed down

attribute-type.name: onkeypress
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed and released

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

attribute-type.name: onchange
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; the element value was changed

attribute-type.name: onmouseover
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto

attribute-type.name: size
attribute-type.description: This attribute tells the user agent the initial width of the control. The width is given in pixels except when type attribute has the value "text" or "password". In that case, its value refers to the (integer) number of characters

attribute-type.name: immediate
attribute-type.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase

attribute-type.name: limitToList
attribute-type.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: onclick
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is clicked

attribute-type.name: onmousedown
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is pressed down

attribute-type.name: timeout
attribute-type.description: Timeout ( in ms ) for request.

attribute-type.name: disabled
attribute-type.description: When set for a form control, this boolean attribute disables the control for user input.

element-type.name: commandLink
element-type.description: Renders an HTML "a" anchor element that acts like a form submit button when clicked. <br /> During Decoding: Obtains the Map from the "requestParameterMap" property of the ExternalContext. If this Map contains non null value for the "clientId" key, creates a javax.faces.event.ActionEvent around the component and passes it to the queueEvent() method of the component. If the request is Ajax-performed, adds its target IDs from the reRender property to the rendered areas list of the nesting AjaxContainer. <br /> element for decoding as described above with the parameters of the component. (PARAM_NAME and PARAM_VALUE are the names and values, respectively, of any nested UIParameter children.) The name and the value must be URLEncoded. If the "styleClass" attribute is specified, render its value as the value of the "class" attribute. Render any non-UIParameter children as normal inside of the "a" element. These will appear as the link text.

attribute-type.name: actionListener
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at method accepting an ActionEvent with return type void

attribute-type.name: reRender
attribute-type.description: Id['s] (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

attribute-type.name: rev
attribute-type.description: A reverse link from the anchor specified by this hyperlink to the current document. The value of this attribute is a space-separated list of link types

attribute-type.name: ajaxSingle
attribute-type.description: if true , submits ONLY one field/link, instead of all form controls.

attribute-type.name: data
attribute-type.description: Serialized (on default with JSON) data passed on the client by a developer on AJAX request. It's accessible via "data.foo" syntax

attribute-type.name: eventsQueue
attribute-type.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.).

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: The content type of the resource designated by this hyperlink

attribute-type.name: lang
attribute-type.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

attribute-type.name: accesskey
attribute-type.description: This attribute assigns an access key to an element. An access key is a single character from the document character set. Note: Authors should consider the input method of the expected reader when specifying an accesskey

attribute-type.name: hreflang
attribute-type.description: Base language of a resource specified with the href attribute; hreflang may only be used with href

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: title
attribute-type.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component

attribute-type.name: style
attribute-type.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

attribute-type.name: dir
attribute-type.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component

attribute-type.name: onblur
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code. The onblur event occurs when an element loses focus either by the pointing device or by tabbing navigation. It may be used with the same elements as onfocus

attribute-type.name: onmouseup
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is released

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: The current value for this component

attribute-type.name: action
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at the application action to be invoked, if this UIComponent is activated by the user, during the Apply Request Values or Invoke Application phase of the request processing lifecycle, depending on the value of the immediate property

attribute-type.name: focus
attribute-type.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: requestDelay
attribute-type.description: Delay (in ms.) for send ajax request on JavaScript event. In conjunction with events queue can reduce number of requests on keyboard or mouse move events.

attribute-type.name: onmousemove
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved within

attribute-type.name: ignoreDupResponses
attribute-type.description: If true, unfinished request will be aborted on new event.

attribute-type.name: ondblclick
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is double-clicked

attribute-type.name: status
attribute-type.description: ID (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of Request status component.

attribute-type.name: onmouseout
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved away

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

attribute-type.name: oncomplete
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: bypassUpdates
attribute-type.description: If true, after process validations phase it skips updates of model beans on a force render response. It can be used for validating components input

attribute-type.name: tabindex
attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767. User agents should ignore leading zeros

attribute-type.name: onkeyup
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is released

attribute-type.name: charset
attribute-type.description: The character encoding of a resource designated by this hyperlink

attribute-type.name: onfocus
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code. The onfocus event occurs when an element gets focus.

attribute-type.name: onkeypress
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed and released

attribute-type.name: onkeydown
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed down

attribute-type.name: shape
attribute-type.description:
default|rect|circle|poly [CI] This attribute specifies the shape of a region. Possible values:
* default: Specifies the entire region. * rect: Define a rectangular region. * circle: Define a circular region. * poly: Define a polygonal region.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

attribute-type.name: onmouseover
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto

attribute-type.name: immediate
attribute-type.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase

attribute-type.name: coords
attribute-type.description:
This attribute specifies the position and shape on the screen. The number and order of values depends on the shape being defined. Possible combinations:
* rect: left-x, top-y, right-x, bottom-y. * circle: center-x, center-y, radius. Note. When the radius value is percentage value, user agents should calculate the final radius value based on the associated object's width and height. The radius should be the smaller value of the two. * poly: x1, y1, x2, y2, ..., xN, yN. The first x and y coordinate pair and the last should be the same to close the polygon. When these coordinate values are not the same, user agents should infer an additional coordinate pair to close the polygon.
Coordinates are relative to the top, left corner of the object. All values are lengths. All values are separated by commas

attribute-type.name: limitToList
attribute-type.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components.

attribute-type.name: target
attribute-type.description:
This attribute specifies the name of a frame where a document is to be opened.
By assigning a name to a frame via the name attribute, authors can refer to it as the "target" of links defined by other elements

attribute-type.name: onclick
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is clicked

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: onmousedown
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is pressed down

attribute-type.name: rel
attribute-type.description: The relationship from the current document to the anchor specified by this hyperlink. The value of this attribute is a space-separated list of link types

attribute-type.name: timeout
attribute-type.description: Timeout ( in ms ) for request.

element-type.name: form
element-type.description: Ajax-related version of html form. Main difference with original component - all hidden fields, nessesary to command links alwais rendered, not depended of rendering links on initial page.

attribute-type.name: ignoreDupResponses
attribute-type.description: If true, unfinished request will be aborted on new event.

attribute-type.name: reRender
attribute-type.description: Id['s] (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

attribute-type.name: status
attribute-type.description: ID (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of Request status component.

attribute-type.name: accept
attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies a comma-separated list of content types that a server processing this form will handle correctly. User agents may use this information to filter out non-conforming files when prompting a user to select files to be sent to the server (cf. the INPUT element when type="file")

attribute-type.name: ajaxSingle
attribute-type.description: if true , submits ONLY one field/link, instead of all form controls.

attribute-type.name: submitted
attribute-type.description: submitted

attribute-type.name: data
attribute-type.description: Serialized (on default with JSON) data passed on the client by a developer on AJAX request. It's accessible via "data.foo" syntax

attribute-type.name: oncomplete
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: bypassUpdates
attribute-type.description: If true, after process validations phase it skips updates of model beans on a force render response. It can be used for validating components input

attribute-type.name: ajaxSubmit
attribute-type.description: If true, it becomes possible to set AJAX submission way for any components inside .

attribute-type.name: eventsQueue
attribute-type.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.).

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

attribute-type.name: onsubmit
attribute-type.description: The onsubmit event occurs when a form is submitted. It only applies to the FORM element

attribute-type.name: onreset
attribute-type.description: The onreset event occurs when a form is reset. It only applies to the FORM element

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: acceptCharset
attribute-type.description:
This attribute specifies the list of character encodings for input data that is accepted by the server processing this form. The value is a space- and/or comma-delimited list of charset values. The client must interpret this list as an exclusive-or list, i.e., the server is able to accept any single character encoding per entity received.
The default value for this attribute is the reserved string "UNKNOWN". User agents may interpret this value as the character encoding that was used to transmit the document containing this FORM element

attribute-type.name: enctype
attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies the content type used to submit the form to the server (when the value of method is "post"). The default value for this attribute is "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". The value "multipart/form-data" should be used in combination with the INPUT element, type="file"

attribute-type.name: limitToList
attribute-type.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components.

attribute-type.name: target
attribute-type.description:
This attribute specifies the name of a frame where a document is to be opened.
By assigning a name to a frame via the name attribute, authors can refer to it as the "target" of links defined by other elements

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: focus
attribute-type.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: timeout
attribute-type.description: Timeout ( in ms ) for request.

attribute-type.name: requestDelay
attribute-type.description: Delay (in ms.) for send ajax request on JavaScript event. In conjunction with events queue can reduce number of requests on keyboard or mouse move events.

element-type.name: htmlCommandLink
element-type.description: Ajax-related version of html commandLink. Single difference with original component - all hidden fields, nessesary to command links alwais rendered, not depended of rendering links on initial page.

attribute-type.name: bypassUpdates

attribute-type.name: eventsQueue
attribute-type.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.).

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: immediate
attribute-type.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase

attribute-type.name: name
attribute-type.description: Name of generated JavaScript function definition

attribute-type.name: limitToList
attribute-type.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components.

attribute-type.name: action
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at the application action to be invoked, if this UIComponent is activated by the user, during the Apply Request Values or Invoke Application phase of the request processing lifecycle, depending on the value of the immediate property

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: focus
attribute-type.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: timeout
attribute-type.description: response waiting time on a particular request. If a response is not received during this time, the request is aborted

attribute-type.name: requestDelay
attribute-type.description: Delay (in ms.) for send ajax request on JavaScript event. In conjunction with events queue can reduce number of requests on keyboard or mouse move events.

element-type.name: include
element-type.description: include content of external view. Navigation cases in included file change only viewId of included page, and don't perform navigation in root view.

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

attribute-type.name: ajaxRendered
attribute-type.description: ajaxRendered

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

attribute-type.name: lang
attribute-type.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

attribute-type.name: keepTransient
attribute-type.description: keepTransient

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: title
attribute-type.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component

attribute-type.name: style
attribute-type.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

attribute-type.name: dir
attribute-type.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component

attribute-type.name: layout
attribute-type.description: HTML layout for generated markup. Possible values: "block" for generating an HTML <div> element, "inline" for generating an HTML <span> element, and "none" for generating no HTML element. There is a minor exception for the "none" case where a child element has the property "rendered" set to "false". In this case, we create an empty <span> element with same ID as the child element to use as a placeholder for later processing.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: viewId
attribute-type.description: viewId for included page.

element-type.name: loadBundle
element-type.description: Load a resource bundle localized for the Locale of the current view, and expose it (as a Map) in the request attributes of the current request. In difference of original f:loadBundle tag, stored in components tree and activate on ajax/non ajax responses

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: basename
attribute-type.description: Base name of the resource bundle to be loaded.

attribute-type.name: var
attribute-type.description: Name of a request scope attribute under which the resource bundle will be exposed as a Map.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: src
attribute-type.description: name of JavaScript resource to load.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: src
attribute-type.description: name of JavaScript resource to load.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

element-type.name: log
element-type.description: Encode javaScript to open popup window with client-side Log information.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: height
attribute-type.description: height of pop-up

attribute-type.name: level
attribute-type.description: log level, possible values : FATAL,ERROR,WARN,INFO,DEBUG,ALL. Component set level 'ALL' by default.

attribute-type.name: popup
attribute-type.description: Render log as popup-window or as div element in page

attribute-type.name: width
attribute-type.description: width of pop-up.

attribute-type.name: name
attribute-type.description: name of pop-up window

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

attribute-type.name: hotkey
attribute-type.description: Keyboard key for activate ( in combination with CTRL+SHIFT ) log window.

element-type.name: mediaOutput
element-type.description: Class for create any link-type elements to user-generated resources : images, sounds, video, active objects, applets etc. Method specified in "CreateContent" attribute will put the data from Data Bean specified in "value" attribute to the OutputStream. Important: Data Bean specified in "value" must implement Serializable.

attribute-type.name: uriAttribute
attribute-type.description: Name of attribute for resource-link attribute ( 'href' for <a>, 'src' for <img> or <script>, etc

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: The content type of the resource designated by this hyperlink

attribute-type.name: hreflang
attribute-type.description: Base language of a resource specified with the href attribute; hreflang may only be used with href

attribute-type.name: expires
attribute-type.description: expires

attribute-type.name: onblur
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code. The onblur event occurs when an element loses focus either by the pointing device or by tabbing navigation. It may be used with the same elements as onfocus

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: Data value calculated at render time and stored in URI (also as part of cache Key ), at generation time passed to send method. Can be used for update cache at change of generating conditions, and for creating beans as "Lightweight" pattern components (request scope). IMPORTANT: Since serialized data stored in URI, avoid using big objects.

attribute-type.name: border
attribute-type.description: Deprecated. This attribute specifies the width of an IMG or OBJECT border, in pixels. The default value for this attribute depends on the user agent

attribute-type.name: vspace
attribute-type.description: Deprecated. This attribute specifies the amount of white space to be inserted above and below an IMG, APPLET, or OBJECT. The default value is not specified, but is generally a small, non-zero length

attribute-type.name: mimeType
attribute-type.description: Geterated content mime-type for append to response header ( 'image/jpeg' etc )

attribute-type.name: element
attribute-type.description: Name of html element for resource link - may be <a> <img> <object> <applet> <script> or <link>

attribute-type.name: ondblclick
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is double-clicked

attribute-type.name: onmouseout
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved away

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

attribute-type.name: align
attribute-type.description:
bottom|middle|top|left|right Deprecated. This attribute specifies the position of an IMG, OBJECT, or APPLET with respect to its context.
The following values for align concern the object's position with respect to surrounding text:
* bottom: means that the bottom of the object should be vertically aligned with the current baseline. This is the default value. * middle: means that the center of the object should be vertically aligned with the current baseline. * top: means that the top of the object should be vertically aligned with the top of the current text line

attribute-type.name: charset
attribute-type.description: The character encoding of a resource designated by this hyperlink

attribute-type.name: onkeyup
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is released

attribute-type.name: onfocus
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code. The onfocus event occurs when an element gets focus.

attribute-type.name: shape
attribute-type.description:
default|rect|circle|poly [CI] This attribute specifies the shape of a region. Possible values:
* default: Specifies the entire region. * rect: Define a rectangular region. * circle: Define a circular region. * poly: Define a polygonal region.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

attribute-type.name: declare
attribute-type.description: declare but don't instantiate flag

attribute-type.name: standby
attribute-type.description: message to show while loading

attribute-type.name: session
attribute-type.description: session

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: onmousedown
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is pressed down

attribute-type.name: cacheable
attribute-type.description: cacheable

attribute-type.name: rev
attribute-type.description: A reverse link from the anchor specified by this hyperlink to the current document. The value of this attribute is a space-separated list of link types

attribute-type.name: hspace
attribute-type.description: Deprecated. This attribute specifies the amount of white space to be inserted to the left and right of an IMG, APPLET, or OBJECT. The default value is not specified, but is generally a small, non-zero length

attribute-type.name: usemap
attribute-type.description: use client-side image map

attribute-type.name: lang
attribute-type.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

attribute-type.name: accesskey
attribute-type.description: This attribute assigns an access key to an element. An access key is a single character from the document character set. Note: Authors should consider the input method of the expected reader when specifying an accesskey

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: title
attribute-type.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component

attribute-type.name: ismap
attribute-type.description: use server-side image map

attribute-type.name: style
attribute-type.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

attribute-type.name: dir
attribute-type.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component

attribute-type.name: converter
attribute-type.description: converter

attribute-type.name: onmouseup
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is released

attribute-type.name: classid
attribute-type.description: identifies an implementation

attribute-type.name: codetype
attribute-type.description: content type for code

attribute-type.name: onmousemove
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved within

attribute-type.name: lastModified
attribute-type.description: lastModified

attribute-type.name: createContent
attribute-type.description: Method call expression to send generated resource to OutputStream. It must have two parameter with a type of java.io.OutputStream and java.lang.Object ( deserialized value of data attribute )

attribute-type.name: tabindex
attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767. User agents should ignore leading zeros

attribute-type.name: onkeydown
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed down

attribute-type.name: onkeypress
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed and released

attribute-type.name: onmouseover
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto

attribute-type.name: coords
attribute-type.description:
This attribute specifies the position and shape on the screen. The number and order of values depends on the shape being defined. Possible combinations:
* rect: left-x, top-y, right-x, bottom-y. * circle: center-x, center-y, radius. Note. When the radius value is percentage value, user agents should calculate the final radius value based on the associated object's width and height. The radius should be the smaller value of the two. * poly: x1, y1, x2, y2, ..., xN, yN. The first x and y coordinate pair and the last should be the same to close the polygon. When these coordinate values are not the same, user agents should infer an additional coordinate pair to close the polygon.
Coordinates are relative to the top, left corner of the object. All values are lengths. All values are separated by commas

attribute-type.name: target
attribute-type.description:
This attribute specifies the name of a frame where a document is to be opened.
By assigning a name to a frame via the name attribute, authors can refer to it as the "target" of links defined by other elements

attribute-type.name: onclick
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is clicked

attribute-type.name: rel
attribute-type.description: The relationship from the current document to the anchor specified by this hyperlink. The value of this attribute is a space-separated list of link types

attribute-type.name: archive
attribute-type.description: space-separated list of URIs

attribute-type.name: codebase
attribute-type.description: base URI for classid, data, archive

element-type.name: outputPanel
element-type.description: Creates an AJAX-enabled part of the page. For a normal request, render a &lt;span&gt; or &lt;div&gt; HTML element depending on the value of the "layout" attribute, "inline" or "block". (The "id" attribute will be the value of the clientId property.) For an AJAX request, the content of this element is included in the response if the value of the property, "ajaxRendered", is set to true.

attribute-type.name: ajaxRendered
attribute-type.description: Defines, whether the content of this component must be (or not) included in AJAX response created by parent AJAX Container, even if it is not forced by reRender list of ajax action. Ignored if component marked to output by Ajax action. default false

attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed down

attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed and released

attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

attribute-type.name: keepTransient
attribute-type.description: Flag for mark all child components to non-transient. If true, all children components will be set to non-transient state and keep in saved components tree. For output in self-renderer region all content ( By default, all content in <f:verbatim> tags and non-jsf elements in facelets, marked as transient - since, self-rendered ajax regions don't plain output for ajax processing ).

attribute-type.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

attribute-type.name: layout
attribute-type.description: HTML layout for generated markup. Possible values: "block" for generating an HTML <div> element, "inline" for generating an HTML <span> element, and "none" for generating no HTML element. There is a minor exception for the "none" case where a child element has the property "rendered" set to "false". In this case, we create an empty <span> element with same ID as the child element to use as a placeholder for later processing.

attribute-type.name: binding

attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is clicked

attribute-type.name: onmousedown
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is pressed down

element-type.name: page
element-type.description:
This component renders a full HTML page structure. It must be the first (and only) child for the view root (JSP <f:view> tag). No HTML code can be outside of this component. It also has support for processing child components in AJAX requests, just like <a4j:region>. For a normal request, it will render the results of a <script> element with a client-side library at the page's <head>. If this component includes a "head" facet, the facet's content will also be rendered at the <head> element. For an AJAX request, only affected components in the full document structure will be rendered.
Here's an example of using it in JSP (jspx version): <jsp:root xmlns:.... <f:view> <a4j:page><f:facet name="head"> ... </f:facet> <!-- page content here --> </a4j:page> </f:view></jsp:root>

attribute-type.name: onunload
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code to execute on a page unload.

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

attribute-type.name: contentType
attribute-type.description: Set custom mime content type to response

attribute-type.name: format
attribute-type.description: Page layout format ( html, xhtml, html-transitional, html-3.2 ) for encoding DOCTYPE, namespace and Content-Type definitions

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

attribute-type.name: lang
attribute-type.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

attribute-type.name: namespace
attribute-type.description: Set html element default namespace

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: immediate
attribute-type.description: Flag indicating that, if this component is activated by ajaxrequest, notifications should be delivered to interested listeners and actions immediately (that is, during Apply Request Values phase) rather than waiting until Invoke Application phase.

attribute-type.name: title
attribute-type.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component

attribute-type.name: selfRendered
attribute-type.description: if 'true' , self-render subtree at InvokeApplication ( or Decode, if immediate property set to true ) phase

attribute-type.name: style
attribute-type.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

attribute-type.name: onload
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code to execute on a page load.

attribute-type.name: dir
attribute-type.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component

attribute-type.name: pageTitle
attribute-type.description: String for output as a page title.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: ajaxListener
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding representing an action listener method that will be notified when this component is activated by the ajax Request and handle it. The expression must evaluate to a public method that takes an AjaxEvent parameter, with a return type of void.

element-type.name: poll
element-type.description: Periodically perform AJAX request to server, to simulate 'poll' data.

attribute-type.name: actionListener
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at method accepting an ActionEvent with return type void

attribute-type.name: reRender
attribute-type.description: Id['s] (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

attribute-type.name: interval
attribute-type.description: Interval (in ms) for call poll requests. Default value 1000 (1 sec)

attribute-type.name: ajaxSingle
attribute-type.description: if true , submits ONLY one field/link, instead of all form controls.

attribute-type.name: data
attribute-type.description: Serialized (on default with JSON) data passed on the client by a developer on AJAX request. It's accessible via "data.foo" syntax

attribute-type.name: eventsQueue
attribute-type.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.).

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: action
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at the application action to be invoked, if this UIComponent is activated by the user, during the Apply Request Values or Invoke Application phase of the request processing lifecycle, depending on the value of the immediate property

attribute-type.name: focus
attribute-type.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: enabled
attribute-type.description: Enable/disable polling

attribute-type.name: ignoreDupResponses
attribute-type.description: If true, unfinished request will be aborted on new event.

attribute-type.name: status
attribute-type.description: ID (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of Request status component.

attribute-type.name: bypassUpdates
attribute-type.description: If true, after process validations phase it skips updates of model beans on a force render response. It can be used for validating components input

attribute-type.name: oncomplete
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

attribute-type.name: onsubmit
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code for call before submission of ajax event

attribute-type.name: immediate
attribute-type.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase

attribute-type.name: limitToList
attribute-type.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: timeout
attribute-type.description: Timeout (in ms) for request

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

element-type.name: region
element-type.description: This tag defines a part of the JSF Tree that is to be decoded on the server side during AJAX request processing

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: immediate
attribute-type.description: Flag indicating that, if this component is activated by ajaxrequest, notifications should be delivered to interested listeners and actions immediately (that is, during Apply Request Values phase) rather than waiting until Invoke Application phase.

attribute-type.name: renderRegionOnly
attribute-type.description: Flag to disable rendering in AJAX responses content outside of active region. If this attribute set to "true" , no one of the components outside of region will be included to AJAX response. If set to "false", search for components to include in response will be performed on all tree. Default "true"

attribute-type.name: selfRendered
attribute-type.description: if 'true' , self-render subtree at InvokeApplication ( or Decode, if immediate property set to true ) phase

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

attribute-type.name: ajaxListener
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding representing an action listener method that will be notified when this component is activated by the ajax Request and handle it. The expression must evaluate to a public method that takes an AjaxEvent parameter, with a return type of void.

attribute-type.name: stateVar
attribute-type.description: stateVar

attribute-type.name: var
attribute-type.description: A request-scope attribute under which the data object for the current row is exposed when iterating

attribute-type.name: rowKey
attribute-type.description: rowKey

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: rendered

attribute-type.name: rows
attribute-type.description: A number of rows to display, or zero for all remaining rows in the table

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: id

attribute-type.name: ajaxKeys
attribute-type.description: ajaxKeys

attribute-type.name: rowKeyVar
attribute-type.description: rowKeyVar

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: value

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: binding

attribute-type.name: first
attribute-type.description: A zero-relative row number of the first row to display

attribute-type.name: componentState
attribute-type.description: componentState

element-type.name: status
element-type.description: Renders area for indicating Ajax request status on the client-side. <br /> During Encoding: Creates two "span" elements with id created as clientId of this component or of target AJAX region (pointed to by the "for" property) with appended ":status.start" and ":status:stop" strings. <br /> "start" span has "display:none" style (hidden). Inside this span, renders the value of the startText/stopText properties or, if they exist, the content of "start" and "stop" facets. <br /> On performing an AJAX request, the client-side script changes the visibility of the "start" span and hides "stop". After all requests for this indicator are completed, restores "stop" and hide "start" start[style,styleClass] and stop[style,styleClass] are rendered for spans as style and class atributes, respectivetly. <br /> During Encoding: Creates two "span" or "div"(depending on 'layout' attribute) elements with id created as clientId of this component or of target AJAX region (pointed to by the "for" property) with appended ":status.start" and ":status:stop" strings. "start" element has "display:none" style (hidden). Inside this element, renders the value of the startText/stopText properties or, if they exist, the content of "start" and "stop" facets. On performing an AJAX request, the client-side script changes the visibility of the "start" element and hides "stop". After all requests for this indicator are completed, restores "stop" and hide "start" <br /> start[style,styleClass] and stop[style,styleClass] are rendered for spans as style and class atributes, respectivetly.

attribute-type.name: onstop
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code, called on the stop of a request.

attribute-type.name: onstart
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code, called on the start of a request.

attribute-type.name: startStyle
attribute-type.description: CSS style class for the element displayed on the start of a request.

attribute-type.name: for
attribute-type.description: ID of the AjaxContainer component whose status is indicated (in the format of a javax.faces.UIComopnent.findComponent() call).

attribute-type.name: lang
attribute-type.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

attribute-type.name: stopText
attribute-type.description: Text for display on request complete.

attribute-type.description: If true, render the ID of the component in HTML code without JSF modifications.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.description: Define visual layout of panel, can be "block" or "inline".

attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is released

attribute-type.description: CSS style class for the element displayed on the start of a request.

attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto

attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is clicked

attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is pressed down

element-type.name: support
element-type.description:
Adds the AJAX functionality for those UIComponent-based componenent that have properties for JavaScript events.
During Decoding: If a request is Ajax-performed, obtains the Map from the "requestParameterMap" property of the ExternalContext. If this Map contains non null value for the "clientId" key, creates a javax.faces.event.ActionEvent around the component, passes it to the queueEvent() method of the component, and then appends it's reRender components IDs to a list of rendered areas.
During Encoding. Doesn't encode as a component. Instead, it adds ValueBinding for a property of the parent component with the name as a value of its "event" property. As a result, when rendered, the parent component builds JavaScript code for submitting an AJAX request on this event.
If the component has child UIParameter components, appends it's name/value as additional request parameters.
If a parent component is an instance of UIInput and the ajaxType property is "input", submits the value of the input field, also. In this case, you can submit a single input field outside of UIForm.

attribute-type.name: actionListener
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at method accepting an ActionEvent with return type void

attribute-type.name: reRender
attribute-type.description: Id['s] (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

attribute-type.name: ajaxSingle
attribute-type.description: if true , submits ONLY one field/link, instead of all form controls.

attribute-type.name: disableDefault
attribute-type.description: Disable default action for target event ( append "return false;" to javascript )

attribute-type.name: data
attribute-type.description: Serialized (on default with JSON) data passed on the client by a developer on AJAX request. It's accessible via "data.foo" syntax

attribute-type.name: eventsQueue
attribute-type.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events (key press, mouse move etc.).

attribute-type.name: parentProperties
attribute-type.description: parentProperties

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: event
attribute-type.description: Name of JavaScript event property ( onclick, onchange, etc.) of parent component, for which we will build AJAX submission code

attribute-type.name: action
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at the application action to be invoked, if this UIComponent is activated by the user, during the Apply Request Values or Invoke Application phase of the request processing lifecycle, depending on the value of the immediate property

attribute-type.name: focus
attribute-type.description: id of element to set focus after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: requestDelay
attribute-type.description: Delay (in ms.) for send ajax request on JavaScript event. In conjunction with events queue can reduce number of requests on keyboard or mouse move events.

attribute-type.name: ignoreDupResponses
attribute-type.description: If true, unfinished request will be aborted on new event

attribute-type.name: status
attribute-type.description: ID (in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent()) of Request status component.

attribute-type.name: bypassUpdates
attribute-type.description: If true, after process validations phase it skips updates of model beans on a force render response. It can be used for validating components input

attribute-type.name: oncomplete
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered.

attribute-type.name: onsubmit
attribute-type.description: JavaScript code for call before submission of ajax event

attribute-type.name: immediate
attribute-type.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase

attribute-type.name: limitToList
attribute-type.description: If "true", updates on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. If "false" (default) updates all rendered by ajax region components.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: timeout
attribute-type.description: Timeout (in ms) for request
